Detailed Description

Contains static functions to compute with referneces used for Drag&Drop and for hyperlinks used in HTML.

Author:
The BibleTime team

const QString CReferenceManager::parseVerseReference (  const QString    ref,
const QString &    lang = QString::null,
const QString &    newLang = "en"
)  [static]
 

Parses the given verse references using the given language and the module.

Parameters:
ref  The verse refernce
lang  The language of the verse reference
newLang  The language of the reference, which will be returned. For example: If BibleTime using an english environment parses a spanish ref (lang=es) the returned ref should be in english (newLang=en), because his english standard module only understands en.
